short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus on your favourite Dota2 team.Get team info and recent match results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to follow your favourite Dota2 team, get team info and most recent game results.You can also check players' and games' details. Light-weighted and simple to Use. It's Kiev Major now, have fun! :)
